member.summary: Represents a mapping betwwen an and a CLR Enum member.

member.summary: Annotation to store cache for concurrency properties

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.CustomAggregateMethodAnnotation
member.summary: Allows client to tell OData which are the custom aggregation methods defined. In order to do it, it must receive a methodToken - that is the full identifier of the method in the OData URL - and an IDictionary that maps the input type of the aggregation method to its MethodInfo.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.CustomAggregateMethodAnnotation.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.CustomAggregateMethodAnnotation.AddMethod(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Type,System.Reflection.MethodInfo})
member.summary: Adds all implementations of a method that share the same methodToken.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.CustomAggregateMethodAnnotation.GetMethodInfo(System.String,System.Type,System.Reflection.MethodInfo@)
member.summary: Get an implementation of a method with the specifies returnType and methodToken. If there's no method that matches the requirements, returns null.
member.returns: True if the method info was found, false otherwise.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.DynamicPropertyDictionaryAnnotation
member.summary: This annotation indicates the mapping from a to a . The is an open type and the is the specific property which is used in an open type to save/retrieve the dynamic properties.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.DynamicPropertyDictionaryAnnotation.PropertyInfo
member.summary: Gets the which backs the dynamic properties of the open type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.ModelNameAnnotation.ModelName
member.summary: Gets the backing CLR type for the EDM type.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.NavigationSourceLinkBuilderAnnotation
member.summary: is a class used to annotate an inside an with information about how to build links related to that navigation source.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.NavigationSourceLinkBuilderAnnotation.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: The default constructor is intended for use by unit testing only.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.NavigationSourceLinkBuilderAnnotation.#ctor(Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmNavigationSource,Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmModel)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The navigation source for which the link builder is being constructed.
The EDM model that this navigation source belongs to.
member.remarks: This constructor creates a link builder that generates URL's that follow OData conventions for the given navigation source.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictions
member.summary: Represents a queryable restriction on an EDM property, including not filterable, not sortable, not navigable, not expandable, not countable, automatically expand.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictions.NotFilterable
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the property is not filterable. default is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictions.NonFilterable
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the property is nonfilterable. default is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictions.NotSortable
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the property is not sortable. default is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictions.Unsortable
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the property is unsortable. default is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictions.NotNavigable
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the property is not navigable. default is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictions.NotExpandable
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the property is not expandable. default is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictions.NotCountable
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the property is not countable. default is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictions.AutoExpand
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the property is automatically expanded. default is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictions.DisableAutoExpandWhenSelectIsPresent
member.summary: If set to true then automatic expand will be disabled if there is a $select specify by client.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictionsAnnotation
member.summary: Represents an annotation to add the queryable restrictions on an EDM property, including not filterable, not sortable, not navigable, not expandable, not countable, automatically expand.

member.name: M:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictionsAnnotation.#ctor(Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of class.
member.param: The queryable restrictions for the EDM property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.QueryableRestrictionsAnnotation.Restrictions
member.summary: Gets the restrictions for the EDM property.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.ReturnedEntitySetAnnotation
member.summary: This annotation indicates the mapping from an to a . The is a bound action/function and the is the entity set name given by user to indicate the entity set returned from this action/function.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.Annotations.EmdModelAnnotationExtensions
member.summary: The extensions for the for the annotations.

member.name: F:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.DefaultAssemblyResolver.Default
member.summary: This static instance is used in the shared code in places where the request container context is not known or does not contain an instance of IWebApiAssembliesResolver.

member.name: T:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.IAssemblyResolver
member.summary: Provides an abstraction for managing the assemblies of an application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.OData.Abstractions.IAssemblyResolver.Assemblies
member.summary: Gets a list of assemblies available for the application.
member.returns: A list of assemblies available for the application.
